```{r histogrambpsys, fig.cap="Change in Systolic blood pressure between last two visits"}
ggplot(
  pdata %>%
    filter(changepop1),
  aes(shf_bpsys_diff)
) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 5, col = global_kicols[1]) +
  theme_minimal() +
  xlab("Change in systolic blood pressure") +
  ylab("Count")
```
